article_title: Another massive year in ERISA settlements
article_text:
Photo: Getty

The number of lawsuits brought under the Employee Retirement Income Security Act totaled 6,925 in 2015, according to the Workplace Class Action Litigation Report, published Seyfarth Shaw, a Chicago-based law firm.

That was actually down a bit in 2014, when 7,163 claims were brought, resulting a record amount of settlements totaling $1.3 billion.

article_metadata.description: ERISA settlements were richer than in any other area of labor law, even though the number of lawsuits brought under the Employee Retirement Income Security Act in 2015 was lower than in 2014.
